Summary: Silver metallic object hovering in the East observed travelling S down I95.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was approximately 11:27am and I travelling South down Interstate 195 when I noticed an object hovering over the treeline in the distance to the East. Conditions were cloudy with what appeared to be high altitude cirrus clouds. Initially I believed what I was observing to possibly be an airplane as TF Green airport is very close to this location. From what I was able to observe for approximately 3-4 mins I did not see any discernable wings or "tail" on the object. The object also did not appear to get smaller ( as if moving away) or bigger ( as if moving towards ) it appeared to stay the same size and remained stationary. Upon further observation, I observed a disk shape to the object and it appeared to be gun-metal gray in color. It appeared to be lighter in color on the top and darker on the bottom as if it were concave and shadowed on the bottom. I lost sight of the object as the road began to turn in the opposite direction. After this observation I began thinking that perhaps I had observed an air plane. Shortly after, I did observe an airplane at approximately the same distance ( 12 miles or so from the initial observation) and I was able to see wings and also that the air plane was moving away from me. The object that I initially observed appeared nothing like the airplane that I saw 10 mins later down the road. What I saw appeared to be a silver metallic disk shaped object hovering over the woods to the East of Interstate 95. The object appeared to not move at all.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Attleboro
There were no other sightings in Attleboro on or around January 6th 2009
